description: Tony DiAngelo declares: But I just want to be with Chase Hunter. I love him so much that I ache inside. When he takes me, caressing my body, holding me close, my body tingles; my toes curl. I am drowning in an ocean of crazy mansex as he ravishes me. He doesn't hold back as he makes wild passionate love to me. I can feel him inside of me, fucking me hard, plunging far deep inside as he tries to pierce my heart with his mighty rod. And at long last, we are one.
title: Hold Me Again
